item.description:
Volunteer at the 19th Annual Run for Food & Shelter

Sunday April 15th. 10 am to 3 pm.

Rivier College

420 S. Main St., Nashua, NH.

Host: Derek

Co-host Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve Ob1 & Derek are volunteering for this event, and they would like for you join them. There is a race, a walk and more. All will be going on during the day. The volunteers will be helping out with these events. Please contact Chris Morrow ASAP at:  www.nsks.org

Adults: if you can help as an on-course monitor (making sure runners stay on-course; help with traffic and runners, etc.), please email Chris at ChrisMorrowHome@comcast.net  We need at least 20 more volunteers!  Mature teens: contact Chris if you would like to help us with the Kid's Sprint.  Thanks!  We couldn't be a success without our volunteers! 

Chris M. wrote: Thank you so very much for volunteering to assist with our event. Please arrive at the Rivier Muldoon Fitness Center a little before 11:00 in
time to check in with the volunteer check in table before 11:00, then attend
the 11:00 course monitors meeting at that same table.  I will utilize you as
a course monitor.  You will likely be volunteering until approximately
3:00pm plus or minus depending on where your stationed, you will need to
remain at your station until the last runner goes by.
    I am assuming that you are an individual?  If you have others who
plan to join you please let me know.            Sincerely;   Chris Morrow

Nashua Soup Kitchen & Shelter is looking for volunteers to help at their 19th Annual Run for Food & Shelter on April 15th from 10AM and until the race is complete.

There will be many parts of the race that they need help with and these task will be handed out on the day of the event. If you have any limitations, please let us know.

If you are interested in helping for this great event, please RSVP and leave your contact information in the Question area.

Additional Information: For info on Soup Kitchen and Shelter see www.nsks.org

Please only RSVP if you are definitely committed to help on that day as they will have a need for all the volunteers that are signed up.

Thanks,  Derek & Steve Ob1.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Volunteer at the 19th Annual Run for Food & Shelter
